cn: 我有一张额度一千的信用卡，使用了一年，仍然无法提现。我该怎么办？

en: Do you have any suggestions for obtaining a temporary credit limit or cash installment options? I usually only get an increase in my credit limit, but never the temporary or cash installment options.
cn: 你有什么建议可以让我获得临时额度或者现金分期吗？我通常只被批准提高固额，从来没有临时额度或现金分期。

en: 20 transactions a month feel just like having no spending at all, while the minimum is 50 transactions.
cn: 每月20笔交易就像没有消费一样，而最低要求是50笔交易。

en: I’ve had the card for six months, and I’ve maxed it out on single purchases every month, but I still haven't seen any increase in my limit. Is there something wrong?
cn: 我已经用这张卡半年了，每个月都会把单笔消费刷到上限，但至今还没有看到额度增加，是不是有什么问题？

en: Is there still any benefit to cash advances? During the first three months after my card was issued, I had twelve to thirteen cash advances each month, and now I'm making my first cash advance after five billing cycles.
cn: 现在预借现金还有什么好处吗？我在下卡后三个月每月预借了十二三笔现金，现在是五期账单后第一次提取现金。

en: On October 26th of last year, there was an option to increase the fixed limit by 35,000 through scheduled bill installment. I opted for it, but up until now, I still haven't received any temporary increase, let alone a permanent one. I’ve always used my card in the same way. Is that how the scheduled installments work, or is there something else?
cn: 去年10月26日有一个预约帐单分期可以将固定额度提高35000，我选择了这个，但到现在为止还没有收到任何临时额度，更别提固定额度了。我一直是用同样的方法用卡。那个预约分期就是这样的操作吗，还是说还有其他情况？

en: Other than Guangfa, all other banks have canceled their services. Now it's just Guangfa (which just increased my limit and offered me a finance product), I've recently opened an account with Pudong Development Bank, and Everbright has always had a temporary limit.
cn: 除了广发之外，其他银行都注销了，现在只有广发（刚提高了我的额度，还给了我一个理财产品），我刚办了浦发的账户，而光大一直有临时额度。

en: Hey bro, does your credit limit only have a fixed amount or are there other options? I only have this one fixed limit and nothing else. Does that mean I'm being treated poorly?
cn: 嘿兄弟，你的额度是只有这个固定额度，还是还有其他的？我这儿就这一个固定额度，别的都没有。这样是不是被坑了呀？

en: The next page keeps showing a network crash message; it seems like the online loan service is down.
cn: 下一页总是提示网络崩溃，看起来网贷服务是无法使用了。

en: It's been a while since you mentioned this; the change is quite significant.
cn: 你这已经好久没提了，变化这么大。

en: This card is not recommended for cancellation; it's much more appealing than the other options.
cn: 这张卡不建议注销，远比其他选项好看多了。

en: The limit is only 50,000; is this meant to encourage saving and spending?
cn: 额度只有五万，这是不是想要鼓励存钱和消费呢？

en: I called customer service to confirm, but it seems that sometimes they don't follow through. Previously, Hengfeng had already exceeded the limit.
cn: 我打电话去客服确认，但好像有时候他们并不会实现之前的承诺，恒丰之前也超过了这个限度。

en: No need to worry, there's no need to go to your branch. Just tell them where you are, and the representative will come to you. If the card has been issued, you can activate it directly through the app.
cn: 不用担心，不用去你们的网点。直接告诉他们你在哪里，业务员会过来。如果卡已经发出了，可以直接通过APP激活。

en: The transaction volume is too low, I've been put in the "black room."
cn: 交易笔数太少，我被弄进小黑屋了。

en: Ping An Tencent Gold: 51k
cn: 平安腾讯金：51k

en: You can't just keep refreshing that 'hey hey hey' multiple times a day, can you? Why doesn't one of the chickens support QR codes? I want to switch between the two chickens for the 'he he'!
cn: 你总不能一天刷很多少次那个“嘿嘿嘿”吧？为什么有一只鸡不支持二维码？我想两个鸡轮流刷“呵呵”！

en: No, the gold card review only starts after submission, right?
cn: 不，金卡是提交后才开始审核，对吧？

en: It is your duty to repay on time. If you fail to repay your debts on time, you won't be allowed to receive your salary card.
cn: 按时还款是你的责任。如果逾期不还债务，就不能发放工资卡。

en: The credit limit for the Palm Life App is most likely the same as that of the credit card.
cn: 掌上生活App的信贷额度很可能和信用卡的额度相同。

en: I previously had a credit limit of 8000 with China Merchants Bank, but I canceled it. Now my application has been under review for a while. Yesterday, the app showed a limit of 8000, but today it suddenly changed to 3000 while my card is still under review. Does this mean that the final credit limit will be 3000?
cn: 我之前在招商银行有8000的额度，但我把它注销了。现在申请一直在审核中。昨天，APP上显示的额度还是8000，今天突然变成3000，而我的卡片还在审核中。这是不是意味着最终额度就是3000呢？

en: Today, over twenty thousand has arrived, and they told me to repay more than ten thousand first. The remaining balance can be negotiated later. I suppose that's acceptable; it feels somewhat lenient.
cn: 今天我的两万多到了，他们让我先还一万多，剩下的可以再协商。我觉得这样也可以，算是比较宽松了。

en: Isn't it over 60,000 now for graduates? I've been naturally stuck at 60,000 for two or three years without any progress.
cn: 现在毕业生的薪资不是超过六万了吗？我已经自然地停留在六万两三年了，丝毫没有动静。

en: Just show your citizen card.
cn: 只要出示你的市民卡即可。

en: I managed to catch the 51 promotion and got it for 19 days, but I missed the classic time. With a limit of 3,000, I would be very satisfied if I get the card.
cn: 我赶上了51的活动，享受了19天，不过我错过了经典发布时间。额度是3000，如果能够顺利下卡我会很满意。

en: You don't have a platinum card, do you? You can easily break the limit on a true platinum card, but there's a restriction based on credit rating. Platinum cards won't work, but you can apply for a diamond card. The higher the card level, the more credit you get...
cn: 你没有白金卡吧？真正的白金卡可以轻松突破这个限制，但这是根据征信等级来规定的。白金卡不行，你可以申请钻石卡。卡级越高，额度就越多……

en: Ping An Vehicle Owner Gold 84k (submitted eight times on April 26, 2021)
cn: 平安车主金84k（2021年4月26日提交八次）

en: The financial interest from manufacturers is low due to subsidies, aimed at better selling vehicles while making money from other sources.
cn: 厂商的金融利息很低，因为有补贴，这样可以更好地销售汽车，同时从其他地方赚取利润。

en: 3k, from China Construction Bank
cn: 3k，来自建设银行

en: Could the experts take a look at which cards to keep or cancel? I have more personal spending abroad, so I’d like to know which cards would be better to cancel. Thank you!
cn: 请专家看看哪些信用卡该保留或注销，我在国外的个人消费比较多，所以想知道哪些卡注销比较好，谢谢！

en: The increase in the credit limit is quite good.
cn: 这次提额的幅度真不错。

en: I'm thinking that since I'll probably apply for online loans and credit cards 15 to 25 times in these 90 days, considering it's already looking bad, why not just apply for all the cards multiple times? Who knows, I might get lucky. If not, it's not a big deal—after all, I'll be okay in six months anyway.
cn: 我在想，既然这90天里我大概会申请15到25次网贷和信用卡，反正信用已经不好了，那不如就多申请几次所有的卡，万一运气好呢？如果不行，也没关系，反正六个月后我都会好起来。

en: It's just about saving money, which feels like getting ripped off... so frustrating.
cn: 这就是存钱，感觉像是在被坑...真让人沮丧。

en: Don't worry about the dark house; it seems like the dark house is still raising the amount.
cn: 不用担心黑房子，看来黑房子还在提高金额。

en: It's hard to figure out the tricks of China Merchants Bank; it's better to take a laid-back approach.
cn: 招商银行的套路不好琢磨，还是淡定一点比较好。

en: My current situation has improved, but I still can't increase my credit limit.
cn: 我现在的状况好了，但额度还是无法提升。

en: Has Dahei lost even the qualification for installment plans?
cn: 大黑是不是连分期付款的资格都没有了？

en: E-installment, what is it? Taking out a loan.
cn: E分期是什么？就是贷款。

en: It's said that using e-service has a high chance of getting you into trouble.
cn: 据说使用e服务很可能会让你遇到麻烦。

en: Don't rush, it's not certain whether it will pass; hard inquiries over ten or twenty times, haha.
cn: 别着急，不一定能通过；硬查询十多次或者二十多次，哈哈。

en: Using Alipay is the most reliable option.
cn: 使用支付宝是最稳妥的选择。

en: The lobby manager advised me to first apply for a savings card and deposit 1,000 yuan. After that, I uploaded screenshots of my real estate, social security, and housing fund. If I get rejected now, I’ll have to wait until next year.
cn: 大堂经理让我先申请一张储蓄卡，先存1000元。然后我上传了不动产、社保和公积金的截图。如果现在被拒，那我就得等到明年。

en: I deposited 50,000 in the Savings Plus account, 30,000 in a fixed term deposit, and 20,000 in a current account. After three months, my online application was rejected, and the staff member also declined my request.
cn: 我存了五万的朝朝盈，三万的定期存款，还有两万的活期。满三个月后，我的网申被拒，而且业务员也拒绝了我的要求。

en: Does the UnionPay single currency card automatically add a USD account?
cn: 银联单币卡是否会自动添加一个美元账户？

en: Renminbi and US Dollar Accounts
cn: 人民币和美元账户

en: I used the E-installment plan for bill installment and ended up in a bit of a financial bind for some time, but now they've increased my credit limit.
cn: 我用了E分期的账单分期，结果一段时间内有点走入了财务困境，不过现在他们给我提额了。

en: I can't register for the petition service in Shanghai. What's the reason? It keeps saying the verification code is incorrect. What am I supposed to do now? I'm exhausted.
cn: 我在上海无法注册信访服务，是什么原因？老是提示验证码不正确。我现在该怎么办呢？我真的很疲惫。

en: My WeChat account has been restricted from receiving various coupons and cannot be used.
cn: 我的微信号被限制领取各种优惠券，无法使用。

en: Your qualifications are good. What documents did you submit for this application?
cn: 你的资质看起来不错。这次申请你提交了哪些资料？

en: I just got this card in June, with a limit of 100,000. The original poster's qualifications are good, so there's no need to worry.
cn: 我这个卡是6月份刚办的，额度10万。楼主的资质是可以的，不用担心。

en: After three months, you can generally get a credit limit increase.
cn: 三个月后，基本上都可以提额了。

en: Bank of China_7.4k
cn: 中国银行_7.4k

en: How can I check my credit limit?
cn: 我怎么查我的信用额度？

en: He won't apply for a Platinum card for you using two cards, will he?
cn: 他不会用两张卡帮你申请一张白金卡吧？

en: Boosting your performance... Haha... Ended up getting played instead.
cn: 提升业绩……哈哈……结果反被坑了。

en: Sister, I'm very young. There have been some changes in the family. If you can help, that would be great; if not, I can provide my credit report. If you're indeed in significant debt and struggling, that's understandable.
cn: 姐姐，我年纪还小，家里发生了一些变故。如果你能帮忙那就太好了；如果不能，我也可以提供我的征信报告。如果你确实负债比较严重，经济困难，那我也理解。

en: Look at my signature; I've been stuck at 41,000 for years. The limit increase has been really slow.
cn: 看看我的签名，我在四万一的额度上已经停了好几年，提升额度的速度实在太慢了。

en: You've been to the bank too many times.
cn: 你去银行的次数太多了。

en: Real consumption on WeChat is no longer available.
cn: 微信上的真实消费也不再存在了。

en: You waited a few days and found no points? The deposit takes two to three days.
cn: 你等了几天发现没有积分？入账要两到三天。

en: It's really easy to get approved for a card from China Merchants Bank. Did you maybe miss filling something out correctly?
cn: 招商银行的下卡很简单啊，你是不是填错什么了？

en: You can apply for another Bank of China 0001 card domestically, or the Winter Olympic card, which offers 5 times the points—quite attractive. The reason Bank of China approves while Citibank does not may be because Bank of China has relatively better cash flow management for its investment products...
cn: 你可以在国内再申请一张中行0001卡，或者冬奥卡，撸5倍积分真的不错。中行能够通过而招行不能，可能是因为中行在现金流理财方面的管理相对更好…

en: Get the card first, whether it's approved or post-approval.
cn: 先申请卡，至于审批与否就随它去吧。

en: I have a credit limit of 50,000, so I can't go beyond that.
cn: 我有5万元的额度，所以不能超过这个。

en: Let's negotiate the credit card repayment. The limit is 60,000, and the interest and penalties have accumulated to 90,000. I've paid back 20,000, leaving a balance of 70,000. I hope the negotiation for repayment won't be delayed, and then we can also lift the savings restriction...
cn: 我们来协商一下信用卡还款吧，额度是6万，利息和罚款已经涨到9万。我已经还了2万，现在还有7万的余额。希望还款的协商不会拖延，这样我们也可以解除储蓄限制……

en: I will try to call and ask. I was sued before, so there might not be much room for negotiation.
cn: 我试着打个电话问一下。之前我被起诉过，所以可能没有太多的商量余地。

en: There's no way around it; after suing you, didn't they apply for enforcement or asset preservation? Generally, all bank accounts under your name would be frozen until the debt is paid off.
cn: 没办法，起诉你之后没申请强制执行或者资产保全吗？通常你名下的所有银行卡都会被冻结，直到还清债务。

en: It's been two years, and the credit limit is still very low.
cn: 两年了，额度依然很低。

en: I have experienced this as well; as soon as my salary is credited, it's instantly deducted due to five overdue loans from E-Loan.
cn: 我也遇到过这样的事，一发工资就秒扣，因为欠了E招贷的五个贷款。

en: The bank requires an in-person visit.
cn: 银行需要上门办理。

en: That means it can't be done in smaller towns.
cn: 那就是说在小地方办不了。

en: Why choose China Merchants Bank? They offer many benefits, high credit limits, and quick credit increases.
cn: 为什么要选择招商银行？他们的优惠很多，额度高，升额也快。

en: Yes, if your online application is approved, you need to visit a branch to meet with the lobby staff for an in-person interview. However, as long as you bring your ID card, you won’t face any difficulties.
cn: 是的，网申通过后，你需要去网点找大堂工作人员面签。不过，只要带着身份证过去，就不会遇到任何刁难。

en: For the first visit, let's find a friend from Xuchang.
cn: 第一次要拜访，我们找个许昌的朋友吧。

en: Add me, I can help you come up with a reliable plan.
cn: 加我，我可以帮你制定一个靠谱的方案。

en: How could someone be so timid and still miss a payment?
cn: 这么胆小的人居然还敢逾期？

en: Xingye Rui Platinum 90K
cn: 兴业睿白金90K

en: In April, I was granted a fixed credit limit along with a temporary limit, which has been extended several times. During this period, I split my payments twice with discounts of 50% and 32%. On June 27th, my temporary limit expired, and I thought I was in trouble. Last night, out of curiosity, I checked my limit and found a new temporary limit of 83,000, down from 93,000, valid until July 27th. I planned to wait until tomorrow to see if it could be extended, but when I checked today, it was still set to expire on July 27th, except the temporary limit had unexpectedly increased to 108,000. It was a pleasant surprise that my credit provider granted me another temporary limit.
cn: 四月份我获得了一个固定额度和一个临时额度，期间多次续期。这段时间我分了两次期，分别享受了五折和三点二折的优惠。6月27号我的临时额度到期，我以为会出问题。昨晚出于好奇我查看了一下额度，发现又有了83000的临时额度，比之前的93000少，期限是到7月27号。我本想等到明天再看看能否延长，今天再看时发现还是只能到7月27号，不过临时额度意外地变成了108000，真是惊喜，小招又给我送了临时额度。

en: CEB 60,000 (Golf White) - Minsheng 38,000 (Car Gold)
cn: 光大6万（高尔夫白）-民生3.8万（车金）

en: Does the Merchants Bank not take photos for corporate accounts?
cn: 招商银行不为企业账户拍照吗？

en: I went through the agreement, took a picture, and that was it. The beautiful招商小姐姐 asked if I had a招商储蓄卡 for automatic repayments. Unfortunately, I already had a card, so I didn't even get the chance to chat a bit more.
cn: 我看完协议拍了照就结束了。漂亮的招商小姐姐问我有没有招商储蓄卡可以用来自动还款。可惜我已经有卡了，没能多聊几句。

en: Overdue negotiations and installment plans
cn: 逾期谈判和分期付款

en: The cost of spending 30,000 is already 114, and I’m not sure if I can even break even after taking advantage of the offer twice. It also increases the risk of using the card.
cn: 花三万的成本就114，我都不确定薅两次羊毛能不能回本，风险还增加了。

en: I’ll go take a look. Does the all-currency card really have no annual fee?
cn: 我去看看，全币卡真的不要年费吗？

en: Should I pay off the entire balance at midnight? I've only paid off a third so far. Will this affect my credit limit?
cn: 我晚上零点是不是要把余额全还清？我现在才还了三分之一，这个会对我的信用额度有影响吗？

en: Just waiting to be rejected, what else can I do? Don't you know China Merchants Bank's first card offers door-to-door service?
cn: 就等着被拒绝了，还能怎么办？难道你不知道招行的首卡有上门服务吗？

en: My 317 appointment application has been overdue for six months, and I still haven't received a response.
cn: 我的317预约申请已经逾期了六个月，依然没有收到任何回复。

en: New cards cannot be paid in installments; they can be split after three months.
cn: 新卡不能分期，三个月后就可以分期了。

en: New card, but you can just bring Daikokuya yourself.
cn: 新卡，但你自己带Daikokuya就可以了。

en: Nearly 200,000 inside. That's a lot!
cn: 里面快有20万了。真是不少啊！

en: The attempt to upgrade the Young card to a campus card was unsuccessful, so I decided to cancel the card. Can anyone tell me how long it usually takes for the cancellation status to appear in the credit report?
cn: 我想把Young卡转成校园卡，但没有成功，就取消了这张卡。请问大家，销卡的状态多久能在信用报告里显示出来呢？

en: As long as the total amount is not too high, it can basically be 3+1.
cn: 只要汇总的金额不高，基本上可以是3+1。

en: Almost 100,000 points left, and besides drinking coffee, they seem useless. Is this debit card still worth it?
cn: 快10万积分了，除了喝咖啡，感觉没什么用。这个储蓄卡还值得用吗？

en: My limit is over 6000. I need to invite 50,000, spend 150,000, and deposit 144,000 to qualify.
cn: 我额度超过6000，需要邀请5万，要消费150000，存入144000才能符合条件。

en: Bank of China 69K, HSBC 34K; Everbright 49K; Bank of East Asia 10K.
cn: 中国银行69万，汇丰34万；光大49万；东亚10万。

en: SPDB is indeed reliable.
cn: 浦发银行确实很靠谱。

en: I've maxed out my limit, bro. Can you leave me half of it? Have you also maxed out other products? Your debt must be really high.
cn: 我额度刷爆了，兄弟。能不能留我一半？你是不是其他产品也都刷爆了？你的负债一定很高吧。

en: A Meituan POS machine with no genuine transactions, only swiped once a month.
cn: 一个美团POS机，没有实际消费，每个月只刷一次。

en: I tried several times recently but still didn't get the card blocked, even after changing machines a few times.
cn: 我最近试了好几次，但还是没有封卡，换了几台机器也没用。

en: Is there a management fee for diamonds? Haha, I heard that private banks don’t charge management fees. When will the diamonds arrive? Bro, why not try to persuade them at a private bank?
cn: 钻石还有管理费啊？哈哈，我听说私人银行是不收管理费的。钻石什么时候能到啊？兄弟，试着跟他们的私人银行聊聊看看？

en: I got a private banking card last year, but now I'm worried about the management fee, which is 4,000 per month.
cn: 我去年办了私行卡，现在愁的是管理费，每个月要4000。

en: Don't try to fool me; you scared me with that management fee. If the total assets under the same name stay above 10 million for six consecutive months, the management fee is waived. For assets between 8 million and 10 million, the fee is 1,000 yuan per month; for assets below 8 million, the fee is 4,000 yuan per month.
cn: 别拿我开玩笑，管理费真让我吓到了。如果同名下的总资产连续六个月保持在1000万以上，管理费就免了；在800万到1000万之间，管理费是每月1000元；如果低于800万，管理费就是每月4000元。

en: You can check where to find the bank card you want to replace in the app.
cn: 你可以在这个应用里查看想换的银行卡在哪里。

en: Has your brother been sued? I've missed payments for 18 months, and after reaching out to the Shanghai petition office, the customer service refused to negotiate a payment plan. I then filed a complaint with the national petition office, but I haven't received a call yet.
cn: 老哥有被起诉吗？我逾期18个月，去上海信访后客服不愿意协商分期计划。后来我又去国家信访投诉了，但还没接到电话。

en: 48 installments is fine, but I want to split my 18 payments into 36 installments, and China Merchants Bank doesn't agree.
cn: 48期可以，18个我想分36期，招商银行不同意。

en: It has been around a year, and my account became dormant in December.
cn: 大约一年了，我的账户在12月变成了呆账。

en: After the overdue period, China Merchants Bank allows for interest-free installments again, with a maximum of 60 installments.
cn: 逾期之后，招行允许再次免息分期，最长可以达到60期。

en: The official statement from China Merchants Bank says there is a 7011. Is the customer service just talking nonsense, or are there new rules being implemented that haven't been officially announced yet? It's confusing. I'm really frustrated with the rewards points, and the sheer volume of complicated merchant categories is overwhelming. I've just given up trying to figure it out.
cn: 招商银行的官方表示有7011。客服到底是在胡说八道，还是有新的规则未正式公布就已经开始实施了？真让人困惑。招商积分我真的很烦，还有那一大堆复杂的商户分类，真是让我感到疲惫，无奈地放弃了。

en: What's changing? Why does it change every day? It's so frustrating.
cn: 哪里在变？为什么每天都在变？真让人烦躁。

en: The numbers are stable, whether temporary or fixed.
cn: 无论是临时的还是固定的，数据都非常稳定。

en: I have already asked for it. Will the temporary withdrawal from China Merchants affect the fixed deposit?
cn: 我已经问过了，招商银行的临时提款会影响定期存款吗？

en: The exemption for direct deposits is regional. Here, the standard and Diamond Golden Sunflower accounts are exempt, but the private banking ones are not.
cn: 代发免是区域性的。我们这边普通和钻石金葵花账户可以免除，但私行账户就不免了。

en: The payroll must be processed through the company's account with China Merchants Bank, right?
cn: 代发工资一定要通过公司的开户行在招商银行吗？

en: The first-time credit card limit of 40,000 from Bank of Communications is just passing by.
cn: 交通银行的信用卡首次额度4万块路过一下。

en: I opened a Pudong Development Bank credit card in 2017, and now the credit limit is 200,000.
cn: 我在2017年办的浦发信用卡，现在额度是20万。

en: Is it possible to check social security and housing fund at every bank?
cn: 每个银行都能查到社保和公积金吗？

en: My card limit is also 3,000, and it took about a year and a half to increase it.
cn: 我的信用卡额度也是3000块，差不多花了一年半才提升。

en: The Xiao Zhao 二卡 is supposed to be approved instantly, right? My card also shares a joint limit of 3K, which is pretty basic. It took almost a year and a half to get an increase in my limit.
cn: 小昭二卡本来就是秒批的吧？我的卡也共享3K的额度，真的是很菜。提额差不多花了一年半的时间。

en: Platinum card?
cn: 白金卡吗？

en: Is this a platinum card?
cn: 请问这是白金卡吗？

en: Does the social security system provide deposit details?
cn: 社保系统提供缴存明细吗？

en: I submitted my application last month, and there hasn't been any update since then. The timeline hasn't changed, and I'm really exhausted from waiting.
cn: 我上个月提交的申请，到现在一点消息都没有，时间也没有变化，等得我真心累。

en: This is the first time I’ve heard of this too, so let’s wait and see. Normally, card production starts within 48 hours, and I guess once it goes into production, there will be a credit limit available.
cn: 这是我第一次听说这种情况，所以我们等等看吧。正常来说，制卡通常在48小时内开始，估计一旦进入制卡阶段，就会有额度了。

en: What can 8k do? The limit is pitifully low.
cn: 8k有什么用？额度实在太低了。

en: Bank of Communications 50k
cn: 交通银行五万块

en: My loan was approved without any hassle; they just asked a few simple questions.
cn: 我的贷款顺利通过了，根本没有任何麻烦，只问了一些简单的问题。

en: Are you upgrading or starting fresh?
cn: 你是升级还是重新办理？

en: No cap, right? My regular card has a limit of 68,000.
cn: 没封顶吧？我的普卡额度是68000。

en: What's wrong with my credit card? Do you look down on me? At least I haven't defaulted, haven't delayed payments, and haven't been subjected to collections!
cn: 我小卡怎么了？你是在看不起我吗？起码我没有违约，没有逾期，也没有被催收呀！

en: The limit on the second category card has been restricted; switching to another card would be fine.
cn: 这张二类卡额度被限了，换张别的卡就可以了。

en: Just take a screenshot of your available balance.
cn: 只需截个图就能看到可用余额。

en: Will the bank ask for a reason if I go to cancel my card without visiting a branch? Just give me back my principal; I don't mind closing the account.
cn: 银行如果我不去柜台销卡，会问我原因吗？只要把我的本金还给我就行，我销卡是无所谓的。

en: No matter what the reasons are, the bank won't fuss too much about it. They will just give you the money, but after the card is canceled, you might end up on a blacklist for some time.
cn: 无论什么原因，银行也不会太多啰嗦。他们会把钱给你，但卡注销后，你可能会被拉入黑名单一段时间。

en: The ICBC standard card can have a credit limit of over a million; it depends on the person, not just the card. Having a platinum card with only a limit of 20,000 is pointless.
cn: 工行的普卡额度也能上百万，看重的是个人资质而不是卡种。要到手的额度才2万的白金卡没什么意义。

en: Some people might have OCD, but credit information isn't pulled every day, as long as it's not excessive.
cn: 有些人可能有强迫症，但信用信息并不是天天都要查询的，只要不频繁就可以。

en: Yunshan Pay offers a customized Golden Cabbage.
cn: 云闪付提供定制的金白菜。

en: The interest is not low at least every month.
cn: 每个月的利息至少都不低啊。

en: It's not advisable to only pay the minimum. Paying the minimum for one or two periods is okay, but consistently doing so could lead to a decrease.
cn: 不建议只还最低。偶尔还一两期可以，但长期只还最低可能会导致下滑。

en: The bank is always a cherry on top.
cn: 银行永远都是锦上添花。

en: I've called so many times, but ICBC is just being stubborn and won't help unless I fall into default.
cn: 我打了好多次电话了，工行就是很固执，逾期了才愿意协商。

en: Accounts in arrears can be closed without waiting for five years.
cn: 逾期帐户可以不需要等五年就直接关闭。

en: My principal of ten thousand in 2009 has grown to nearly one hundred and thirty thousand now. Is it really that difficult to manage when I paid back twelve thousand six or seven years ago? I wonder how much it would be estimated now.
cn: 我09年的本金一万到现在算了将近十三万，真有这么难处理么？我六七年前还了一万二，现在估计得多少？

en: I have a credit card and a limit, but I can't seem to use it.
cn: 我有信用卡和额度，但就是不能用。

en: In 2016, I defaulted on a loan of 30,000 yuan, and now it's over 66,000 yuan. I went to negotiate the other day, and I can't accept any less.
cn: 2016年我逾期了3万，现在已经涨到6万6千多。我前天去协商了，哪怕一分都不能少。

en: Your interest is higher than mine. My principal is one hundred thousand. After five years, the total amount including principal and interest is 2.
cn: 你的利息比我高。我的本金是一十万。五年后，本息总共是2。

en: Yes, yes. It has been two months already. Doesn't that prove it's safe?
cn: 是的，没错。已经过了两个月了，这不就证明它安全了吗？

en: ICBC allows for mailing services to different locations; I just switched.
cn: 工商银行提供异地邮寄服务；我刚刚更换了。

en: The issues with being in a different location shouldn't be significant. Is it possible to renew the card without issuing a new one? I'm also from another province, what's the fastest way?
cn: 在异地应该问题不大。续卡可以不需要重新发卡吗？我也是外省的，最快的方式是什么？

en: Very convenient. There's no need; even if the card issuer changes, the line division remains the same as the II card, which can activate the phone.
cn: 非常方便，没必要；就算换了发卡行，线分还是跟II卡一样，可以激活手机。

en: Can I still withdraw money from ICBC's 19 branches?
cn: 我还能从工行的19家支行取钱吗？

en: It's relatively easy to get approved for positions 1 to 4 at China Construction Bank, while it doesn't matter as much at Industrial and Commercial Bank.
cn: 在建设银行1到4的职位比较容易通过，而在工商银行就没那么重要了。

en: The message says the card is being processed, but I’m not sure if there’s a physical card, and the credit limit hasn’t been determined yet.
cn: 短信显示卡片正在制作中，但我不确定是否会有实体卡，额度还没确定。

en: Wow, does this digital card come with a physical one? Is it for real?
cn: 哇，这张数字卡真的有实体卡吗？真的假的？

en: Is there a UnionPay channel for this card? Can it be linked to Alipay for transactions?
cn: 这个卡有银联通道吗？可以绑支付宝刷吗？

en: Great news, my card has also been approved, and I activated it directly in the ICBC e-Living digital card section.
cn: 太棒了，我的卡也通过了，直接在工银e生活数字卡专区激活的。

en: The progress looks good today; the credit limit increase should be coming soon.
cn: 今天的进度看起来不错，提额应该很快就来了。

en: On one hand, it's been six months. On the other hand, you might want to try Clear's instant approval for unlimited sharing. After that, I applied for the Forbidden City and authorized Rong E Borrow. The next day, I was able to borrow, and today I see that the Forbidden City was approved...
cn: 一方面过了半年，另一方面你可以试试Clear的秒批共享无界。然后我申请了故宫，授权了融E借。第二天就借到了，今天我看到故宫也批下来了……

en: I plan to write about a legitimate organization, but I don't have a landline. Should I explain this directly, or is it better to use my previous organization's phone number?
cn: 我打算写一个真实的单位，但我没有座机，直接说明这个情况好还是之前单位的电话更合适？

en: I also called the bank to provide additional information, but my account is still locked. I've applied for an unlocking, and it's been 7 days with no response. I'm so frustrated that I only made the minimum payment.
cn: 我也给银行打了电话补充信息，但我的账户还是被锁着。我申请了解锁，已经7天没收到任何回应。我气得只还了最低还款。

en: Paying down debt through installments: ICBC, CITIC, Ping An, and Bank of China allow for debt reduction through installments, while China Merchants Bank, Everbright, and Agriculture Bank do not. Can Guangfa also reduce debt through installments? This is the credit card I have in hand.
cn: 通过分期付款来减轻负债：工商银行、中信银行、平安银行和中国银行可以通过分期付款减轻负债，而招商银行、光大银行和农业银行则不行。广发银行的分期也能减轻负债吗？这是我手头的信用卡。

en: The 200,000 big platinum I bought back in May 2019 is still just 200,000. Can you wise guys think of a way to help?
cn: 我19年5月买的20万大白金，现在还是20万。各位高手，帮我想想办法。

en: Is Shenzhen Bank's mini product available? The minimum amount is 20,000? I only have between 3,000 and 20,000.
cn: 深圳银行的mini产品有吗？最低起批是两万？我只有3000到20000。

en: I can't see any limits at all, and I just got my card approved.
cn: 我根本看不到额度，而且我刚刚申请的卡就已经批下来了。

en: The new regulations refer to just Dama Bank or all banks?
cn: 新规定是指大妈银行还是所有银行？

en: Is the Four-Star credit card easy to apply for?
cn: 四星信用卡好申请吗？

en: "Three times" refers to something specific, but I haven't withdrawn anything since I got my card six months ago.
cn: “三倍”指的是什么，我下卡半年了，什么都没有提过。

en: I've been using the last card for over a year... Not a single mention of anything, it's really disappointing.
cn: 我用的上一张卡已经超过一年了... 一点消息都没有，真让人失望。

en: ICBC, the application interface is up.
cn: 工商银行，申请界面已经开启。

en: I have a credit limit of 35,000, but my credit score is poor, so I can't even get an Industrial and Commercial Bank credit card.
cn: 我有三万五的额度，但是我的信用记录不好，所以连工商银行的信用卡都申请不到。

en: I requested SMS banking last year and then added a credit report service.
cn: 我去年申请了短信银行服务，然后又加了一项征信服务。

en: I can't maintain it. I need to cancel the card and reapply.
cn: 我养不起这个。需要销卡重新申请。

en: It's either an instant approval or it gets sent for manual review, which is really frustrating, to be honest.
cn: 要么就是秒批，要么就转人工审核，实在是让人很烦。

en: My credit score of 27,000 is instantly available, just like yours.
cn: 我27000的征信秒到和你的一样。

en: My funds arrived instantly as well. I was trying to increase my credit card limit. Can I return the Rong e loan directly now, or do I need to transfer it to someone else's account before transferring it back?
cn: 我的款项也秒到。为了提高我的信用卡额度，我现在可以直接还回融e借吗？还是需要先转到其他人的账户再转回来？

en: Is it better to choose Industrial and Commercial Bank or China Construction Bank? Stability is what really matters.
cn: 到底是工商银行好还是建设银行好呢？稳定性才是最重要的。

en: Overdue payments reported to credit bureau?
cn: 逾期付款会被上报到信用机构吗？

en: Applying for another card online and canceling this one with a risk control limit would perfectly resolve the issue.
cn: 申请一张其他卡，然后注销这张风控额卡，效果会非常好。

en: Can teachers and doctors of Wujie only apply at the machines in the branches?
cn: 无界老师和无界医生只能在网点的机器上申请吗？

en: Is this card received through waiting, or do we have to actively go to the bank for an in-person interview? Also, I've heard some people say that once you get this card, you'll have 13 accounts under your name, which is a bit scary.
cn: 这个卡是等着收，还是需要主动去银行面签？还有，我听说办了这个卡后，会有13个账户在你名下，这让我有点担心。

en: I have a mortgage of 1.1 million, a personal loan of 150,000, and I also got approved for a MasterCard Platinum.
cn: 我有110万的房贷，15万的信用贷款，并且申请万事达白金卡也顺利批准了。

en: Wow, the Industrial and Commercial Bank's payroll service is pretty solid, and the融e借 loan limit is generally quite good. Once borrowed, adjust it back to balance. How much can you borrow with your融借?
cn: 哇，工商银行的代发工资服务挺不错的，融e借的贷款额度普遍也很不错。借出后再调整回来，你可以借多少呢？

en: Impressive! How long does it take to get the Rong E Loan Card?
cn: 厉害了，融E借用卡多久能出来？

en: The key issue is that there are no physical cards right now—one is for Wujie and the other for Clear. Even if I borrow one to balance out Wujie... I can't use it on POS machines. It's really frustrating.
cn: 关键问题是现在没有实体卡——一张是无界卡，另一张是Clear卡。即使我借来调和无界……也不能在POS机上使用。真让人心累。

en: When calling customer service, how should I talk to them? The customer service of China Merchants Bank is not easily fooled.
cn: 打电话时我应该怎么说？招商银行的客服并不好对付。

en: The process at physical branches and online applications is still different.
cn: 网点的办理流程和网上申请还是不一样的。

en: Go to the loan department and find the manager who helped you with the mortgage.
cn: 去信贷部门找一下帮你办理房贷的经理。

en: Calm down, my first credit card took a year and a half to get approved.
cn: 淡定，我的第一张信用卡当年审核了整整一年半。

en: How long will it take before I'm required to repay, so I can prepare the money?
cn: 一般需要多久才会被要求还款，以便我能准备好钱？

en: I don't know; the installment plans for the aunties are not high.
cn: 我不知道，大妈的分期付款并不高。

en: Loan paid off, never using microloans again
cn: 贷款还清，绝不会再用小额贷款。

en: The credit limits in Pudong are impressive! How did they achieve that?
cn: 浦东的额度真高啊，他们是怎么做到的？

en: The qualifications should be quite good. At this age, being able to get a few high-limit credit cards is impressive. Let's take a break and average out those debts, maybe wait for a year or so.
cn: 资质应该很好，这个年纪能拿到几个高额度的信用卡确实不容易。我们休息一下，把那些欠款分摊一下，等一年半载再说。

en: The report has no issues, it's just that there have been too many inquiries lately. Previously, I was a blank slate.
cn: 报告没什么问题，只是最近查询太多了。以前我还没有信用记录。

en: It's a shame I closed the White Qilin card last year; now I have to wait a full year to reapply. Closing it felt good at the moment, but now there's nothing I can say about the wait. :'（
cn: 真可惜我去年把白麒麟卡注销了，现在得等满一年才能重新申请。销卡的时候感觉爽，但现在只能无话可说地等着。:'（

en: Is this a recent card approval? Could you please let me know the area where the card was issued?
cn: 这是最近的下卡吗？能告诉我下卡的地区吗？

en: It's reasonable to think that everyone can have a credit limit of 30,000.
cn: 想得太多了，大家都有三万的信用额度其实也还不错。

en: The gift was received, and the limit is still decent.
cn: 送到了，额度还不错。

en: What does it mean to have a JCB undercoating? If I don't have it, can I still enjoy a 60,000 spending exemption? Is the annual fee waived as well?
cn: 下挂JCB是什么意思？如果我没有下挂，六万的刷卡免年费还适用吗？年费也免吗？

en: The curve has failed; the limit on my three cards has not only not increased but has actually decreased by ten thousand. It's frustrating.
cn: 曲线没用，三张卡的额度不但没有增加，反而减少了一万，真让人烦。

en: I do have referral slots, but I find it unreliable and am worried about the risks involved.
cn: 我也有推荐名额，不过觉得不太靠谱，担心风险。

en: Xiao Zhao doesn’t apply for a card unless it’s below 60K.
cn: 小昭不到60K就不申请信用卡。

en: The efficiency of the aunt is impressive; getting things done in just a week is quite fast.
cn: 大妈的效率真厉害，一周就搞定事情确实很快。

en: What qualifications are needed for a credit limit of 100,000?
cn: 什么条件才能申请10万的额度？

en: No need for Photoshop; just provide the digital images, and you can request as much editing as you want.
cn: 不需要PS，只要提供数字图片，你需要多少PS就多少。

en: The PS service should be straightforward; you can choose any time you want. The technology is quite good.
cn: PS服务应该直接明了，你可以选择任何时间。技术还是挺不错的。

en: Such a loss! If it weren't for this, your credit score would be pretty good.
cn: 太亏了！要不是这个，你的信用记录应该很好。

en: I recommend keeping accounts with Xinyi Bank, Postal Savings Bank, Industrial and Commercial Bank, China Merchants Bank, and Bank of China. The reasons are: Xinyi offers high credit limits and can continuously increase without much usage. Guangfa cannot increase the limit without making installment payments. Agricultural Bank's limit increases are quite difficult now, and Aixin has low credit limits and few privileges.
cn: 我建议保留兴业银行、邮政储蓄银行、工商银行、招商银行和中国银行的账户。理由是：兴业银行额度高，使用不多也能一直提高；光大银行不做分期是很难提高额度的；农行现在提额度非常困难；阿信银行的额度不高，权益也很有限。

en: From my experience, transactions made with the Borderless Card are often approved instantly, while those that take a day are usually declined. In your case, if it's been in the system for so long, it probably needs to be escalated to a human representative.
cn: 根据我的经验，无界卡的交易一般都能即时通过，而那种要隔一天的基本上都被拒绝了。你这种情况在系统里躺了这么久，应该需要转人工处理了。

en: It's not bad, so I won't exchange it. Anyway, the Android OTG works fine, so it doesn't matter.
cn: 这没有什么问题，我就不换了。反正安卓OTG也能用，没关系。

en: The problem is that the big four banks don't have staff coming to assist at home. When applying online ourselves, we often run into issues with the card.
cn: 问题是四大行没有员工上门服务，自己网上申请的时候，经常遇到卡的问题。

en: It's rare to see someone here dealing with credit cards worth tens of thousands.
cn: 这里居然还会有人在处理几万的信用卡，真是挺少见的。

en: You can choose any of them, just go to the ATM first to update all your information.
cn: 你随便选一个，先去ATM更新一下所有资料。

en: I replied to this message on the 24th, and it showed as received on the 27th. The account was opened on the 30th, but I still haven't been asked to go for the interview. I've reported the password device as lost, so I'll get another one when I go for the interview. If that's not possible, I’ll see if I can use the USB security token to open it...
cn: 我24号就回复了这个短信，27号显示受理，30号已经开户，但到现在还没叫我去面签。我已经挂失了密码器，面签的时候再补一个。如果真的没有的话，我再看看U盾能不能开通...

en: You can waive the annual fee with either 10,000 or 15 transactions, but I'm thinking of holding off to see if there's a lifetime waiver for the Global White card.
cn: 可以通过1万或15笔交易免除年费，不过我在考虑等等看是否有环球白卡的终身免年费。

en: The Construction Bank issued a card with a limit of 33,000. Not bad, right?
cn: 建行给我的卡额度是33,000，还不错吧？

en: I’m in the same situation. I just received my card today at the branch. My location is 010. The card has been activated. Yours should arrive in a couple of days, right? Just be a little more patient.
cn: 我也是一样的情况。今天刚在网点拿到卡，地点是010。卡已经开通了。你的应该也就在这几天到了吧，耐心等一等吧。

en: I opened my account on the 29th, and it’s still in the card production status. I’m not sure when it will be available at the branch. It’s a card from China Merchants Bank.
cn: 我29号开了户，现在还是在制卡状态。 不知道什么时候能到网点。这是招商银行的卡。

en: I applied for a loan of 200,000 but after using 150,000 and repaying it, I found my credit limit was reduced to 0!
cn: 我申请了20万的贷款，使用了15万后还完款，发现我的信用额度变成0了！

en: I am preparing to apply for the Military Soul Card or the Struggle Card.
cn: 我准备申请军魂卡或者奋斗卡。

en: No, the forum is mistaken. The posts from those bosses are copying each other and even contain errors.
cn: 不，论坛是错的。那些老板的帖子互相抄袭，甚至还出现错误。

en: Is it a double five-star rating or just a five-star service? We need to clarify the standards first.
cn: 是双五星还是五星服务？我们首先要搞清楚标准。

en: In Guangzhou, it's the same. When financial managers see you don’t have at least a million, they talk to you about dreams. But once they see you have a million, they act like loyal servants, treating you like a VIP!
cn: 广州这边也是一样的，理财经理看到你没一百万就和你讲一些没用的东西，但一旦看到你有100万，他们就像舔狗一样，把你当大爷一样伺候。

en: My first card was invited by ICBC. I deposited 20,000, and I have 11 accounts, although.
cn: 我人生中的第一张卡是工行邀请办的，存了两万，虽然有11个账户。

en: Is this something that requires him to reach the limit on his own, or should he click on something?
cn: 这是他需要自己达到额度，还是需要点击某个地方？

en: Three thousand under industrial and commercial operations at the beginning of the year, sold at the end of the year, no amount mentioned.
cn: 年初在工商运营下的3000，年底卖掉了，没提到具体金额。

en: I went to ICBC a few days ago to upgrade my first-generation U Shield to the second generation you showed, which cost 55 yuan. Replacing the card was 5 yuan.
cn: 我前几天去工行把一代U盾升级成你发的二代，花了55元。换张卡又花了5元。

en: There’s a product called Rong E Borrow, which you can access through the U Shield and then adjust the frequency for the credit card.
cn: 里面有个叫“融e借”的产品，只需通过U盾借出来，然后调整一下信用卡的使用频率。

en: I'm preparing for a combined loan, and after a lot of effort, I've finally gathered all the necessary documents. However, today the sales office informed me that the bank hasn't processed the housing fund qualification yet. It's really frustrating. The housing fund loan has a time constraint, and I haven't dared to use my credit card for several months now. It's just...
cn: 我在准备组合贷款，费了很大劲才把所有需要的文件都准备齐全。可是今天售楼部告诉我，银行那边的公积金资格还没有处理好，真让人沮丧。公积金贷款是有时效性的，我好几个月都不敢用信用卡了，真是...

en: My situation is the same, bro. Have you resolved yours?
cn: 兄弟，我的情况也是这样。你的解决好了吗？

en: Payments are collected during the day, and the funds are credited to the account late at night, between 2 and 3 AM.
cn: 白天收款，晚上2点到3点到账。

en: Great? I'm still not getting any response? The auntie is going through menopause.
cn: 太棒了？我还是没有收到任何回复？那个大妈正在经历更年期。

en: Two airport transfers, unlimited access to the VIP lounge, 10 points for long-term loyalty, one complimentary stay at a high-end hotel, and one buffet dinner for two at a high-end hotel.
cn: 两次接送机，无限次贵宾室，10点龙腾，一次高端酒店免费住宿，以及一次高端酒店的双人自助餐。

en: If it's something that can be done, then it's not a problem; many places aren't processing applications anymore.
cn: 如果能办成的就不是问题，很多地方都不再受理申请了。

en: If you don't set up installments with ICBC, they will keep taking money from you every month relentlessly.
cn: 如果你不选择分期付款，工行每个月都会狠狠扣你钱。

en: Last month, at the end of the month, I applied for a 39,000 loan from Huaxia. Do you remember? The day before yesterday, I applied for a 12,000 loan from SPDB through UnionPay, and it got approved. It's strange how these banks work – when you have a credit issue, they refuse to lend you money, but when you don't really need it, they approve your application so easily.
cn: 上个月底我申请了39000的华夏贷款，你还记得吗？前天我又通过云闪付申请了浦发的12000，结果也批下来了。这银行真奇怪，信用上有逾期的时候，你需要钱的时候它死活不批，而你不太需要的时候反而轻松就批了。

en: I see you don't often take out small loans. How could you be a credit newcomer?
cn: 我看你不常贷款，怎么会是信用白户呢？

en: Will this card be issued with a UnionPay card?
cn: 这个卡会配有银联卡吗？

en: I can't reach it! So I was startled when I saw it.
cn: 我无法达到啊！所以一看到就吓了一跳。

en: Search for the People's Bank of China on Baidu Maps; every place has a branch of the central bank, even small counties. You can just go there and print it out.
cn: 在百度地图上搜索中国人民银行，每个地方都有央行，连小县城都有。你可以直接去那儿打印出来。

en: On the app, it’s convenient to manage daily life.
cn: 在这个应用程序上，生活管理非常方便。

en: How does it compare to Rong E Borrow?
cn: 比融e借怎么样？

en: I also received it. It's for checking credit, not for a pre-approved limit. The operation of "Quick Loan" and "Easy Borrow" is straightforward. "Easy Borrow" and "Quick Loan" both provide direct pre-approval of limits, and the funds can be disbursed instantly with a click.
cn: 我也收到了。这是用来查征信的，不是预审额度。“经营快贷”和“容易借”的操作很简单。“容易借”和“经营快贷”都直接预批了额度，点击就能秒下款。

en: I suddenly received a loan of 160,000 from Rong E-Jie without any explanation, even though my previous applications were unsuccessful.
cn: 我突然收到融e借给我的16万贷款，真不知道为什么，以前申请都不行。

en: You can still sell it? How do you sell it??? Is this even possible?
cn: 还能继续卖？怎么卖的？？？这真的能操作吗？

en: The application for a second card should also share the credit limit, right?
cn: 申请第二张卡应该也是共享额度，对吧？

en: The standard isn't just a blank slate.
cn: 标准并不是一张空白的纸。

en: I dare not dream of the platinum, preparing to hold onto my gold until old age...
cn: 我不敢奢望大妈的白金，只打算把我的黄金守到老。

en: It's best to answer the phone calls; when the bank urges you, just pay up. However, I had a period of three months where I didn't make any payments and lost contact, which led to me being sued. Now I'm subject to restrictions on high spending.
cn: 最好接听电话；银行催你时，就还款。不过，我有三个月没有还款，且失联，结果被起诉了。现在我被限制高消费。

en: Be cautious with 942. Previously, I used 5 bricks to upgrade to 6 stars, and it took me 3 years to get out of the gray house. Now, going straight to 50 bricks is a leap, and there's still risk involved in upgrading stars.
cn: 小心942。我之前花了5砖升到6星，结果在灰房里呆了3年才出来。现在直接用50砖一步到位，升星还有风险。

en: I also got my application approved, but the activation failed. I'm not sure what to do. Let's wait for the notice from ICBC.
cn: 我也是申请通过了，但开通失败了，不知道该怎么办。先等工行的通知吧。

en: It's very easy to tell if it's genuine or not. Don't bother looking at the text message; just check through the official ICBC app or call their customer service directly! That way, you can tell what's real and what's not...
cn: 这很简单就能分辨出真假。别看短信，直接用工商银行的正规app查询，或者打客服电话！这样就能辨别真伪了……

en: When you click on "Immediate Repayment" in the app, it will naturally show you the optimal repayment amount, which is the amount you need to repay. If you pay it all off, it will say "This period's bill has been fully paid."
cn: 当你在APP上点击“立即还款”时，系统会自动显示出最优还款金额，这就是你需要偿还的金额。如果全部还清，系统会提示“本期账单已还清。”

en: I borrowed 300,000 for the first time, and the limit can be adjusted to 10+30. The "borrow now" button turned grey immediately. After I paid it back and borrowed another 200,000, I was able to adjust it to 500,000. Thanks to the expert!
cn: 我第一次借了30万，额度可以调整到10+30，借款按钮立刻变成了灰色。还款后再借了20万，就能够调整到50万了，感谢大神！

en: The main focus this year is on cracking down on gambling and pig slaughter scams related to money laundering.
cn: 今年的主要打击对象是赌博和与洗钱相关的杀猪盘诈骗。

en: Is that WeBank? Is it an online lending platform?
cn: 那是微众银行吗？是一个网贷平台吗？

en: Switch to another branch—020 charges a fee for the U Shield, I believe it’s around 20.
cn: 换个网点的话，020办理U盾要收手续费，应该是20块左右。

en: There's a one-yuan store at ICBC in Shenzhen, where you can get ten-yuan takeaway vouchers and all sorts of video memberships for just one yuan. But you have to be quick!
cn: 深圳工行有个一元店，可以花一块钱买十块钱的外卖券和各种视频会员等羊毛。不过手要快哦！

en: What does the grace period mean? Also, how come my Industrial and Commercial Bank credit card still has a five-star rating even though I only spend less than 300 yuan in a month?
cn: 缓冲期是什么意思？还有，我在工行的信用卡一个月花不了300块，怎么还是五颗星的评级？

en: I have decided to keep ICBC, China Construction Bank, and Guangzhou Bank, while closing all the others. I can't increase my Agricultural Bank limits; China lacks solid options. There's no need to keep the transportation-related accounts, and the limits on Guangfa Bank are too low, so I'll close that too. I also suggest not applying for any new cards for the next six months. After that, when applying for a fourth card, there's a high chance of getting an approval limit between 30,000 and 50,000.
cn: 我决定保留工商银行、建设银行和广州银行，其他都关了。农业银行的额度提不上去，中国也没有什么实在的选择。交通类账目我觉得没必要留，广发的额度太低，也关了。接下来半年内别申请新卡，半年后再申请第四张卡，额度很有可能在三到五万之间。

en: The limit is roughly around 10%.
cn: 额度差不多，基本在10%左右。

en: CCB has water, CMB has water, ABC has water, but ICBC has no water. Charge!
cn: 建行有水，招商有水，农行有水，工商没有水，冲！

en: It's not worth it; just go for the Ping An Good Driver program. The fuel savings are great.
cn: 不划算，还是去参加平安好车主活动，油费省得很舒服。

en: What a bummer! The promotion is available, but it doesn't support credit card payments.
cn: 真是太糟糕了！优惠来了，但不支持信用卡支付。

en: Newcomers are posting; your support and encouragement would be greatly appreciated on the 17th!
cn: 新人们开始发文，希望大家在17号给予多多支持和鼓励！

en: CCB reviews my loan every month, and sometimes even twice a month.
cn: 建行每个月会对我的贷款进行一次审核，有时候一个月会审核两次。

en: You don't need to. Increasing your credit card limit requires a USB security token, and if you haven't applied for one, the option to raise your limit won't be available.
cn: 不需要，调高信用卡额度需要u盾，如果你没有申请过u盾，就没有提额的选项。

en: The credit limit for my Rong E Loan is still higher than my card limit.
cn: 我融e借的额度还比我的卡额度高。

en: There's nothing we can do, just patiently wait.
cn: 那就没办法了，只能耐心等待。

en: As for increasing the credit limit, I wonder if it's possible to call customer service for assistance, or if I should apply for a second card instead.
cn: 至于调高信用额度，我在想打电话给客服是否可行，或者我是否应该申请第二张卡。

en: Other banks haven't offered this in recent years; it's only recently that Agricultural Bank approved the mortgage.
cn: 这几年其他银行没有推出过这种产品，只有农业银行最近才批准了按揭贷款。

en: The current bank cards that look a bit nicer all come with a card face fee.
cn: 现在好看一点的银行卡都需要缴纳卡面费。

en: The installment transaction I checked online on the 5th of this month hasn’t shown up. It only displays the amount due for the current month. Did the installment transaction for the April bill get processed?
cn: 我这个月5号在网上查的分期交易没显示出来，只显示了这个月的应还金额。难道四月份的账单分期交易已经处理了吗？

en: If I have to choose one among the remaining three options after leaving Industrial and Commercial Bank and China Merchants Bank, I would pick Bank of China. This is because they offer options to exchange points for mobile top-ups and fuel cards, and certain card types earn triple points.
cn: 如果我在留了工商银行和招商银行后，从剩下的三家中选择一家的话，我会选中国银行。因为他们提供可以兑换话费和油卡的服务，而且特定的卡种可以获得三倍积分。

en: This is really easy to choose. I'm disregarding Bank of Communications and Pudong Development Bank.
cn: 这真的太好选了。我不考虑交行和浦发了。

en: It's too vague; we need to start with commercial banks.
cn: 这太模糊了，我们得从商业银行入手。

en: It has been over six months. At that time, there was nothing done directly, and perhaps the rules have changed.
cn: 已经半年多了，当时什么都没有直接去做，可能规则已经变了。

en: Check out ICBC e-Life; you might have already been rejected...
cn: 去工银e生活看看，说不定你已经被拒绝了……

en: The limit on the card for older clients doesn't matter; you just need to find the right benefits that suit you.
cn: 大妈的卡额度并不重要，找对适合的权益就可以了。

en: A certain cardholder actually got six yuan, with a discount of six yuan for purchases over 6.01, but it has to be scanned! :D
cn: 某某卡友竟然领了六块钱，买满6.01元减6块，但得被扫才行！:D

en: Both of my ICBC cards offer a 10 yuan discount, but how come yours is only 5 yuan?
cn: 我在工行的两张卡都是减10元，怎么你们的才减5元呢？

en: I have always used QuickPass to pay off my credit card.
cn: 我一直都是用云闪付来还信用卡。

en: What's the point of those thousands? Obscure banks like Pudong Development Bank just love to deal with those amounts.
cn: 这种几千的有何意义？像浦发这样的二流银行就是喜欢搞这些金额。

en: The qualifications are not up to par, so there's nothing that can be done; I can't even apply for a credit card.
cn: 资质不行，没办法啊，连信用卡都申请不了。

en: CITIC is great for those who frequently use their services, but the points are not worth much.
cn: 中信对常用它的人来说很不错，但积分不值钱。

en: Can I use my card without WeChat?
cn: 我可以不用微信刷卡吗？

en: I've checked, and the points details show that there are points for online payments and large transactions, but there are no points for contactless payments.
cn: 我查了一下，积分明细里只有网络支付和大额消费能积攒积分，闪付是没有积分的。

en: Transactions over 1000 cannot be processed through quick payment.
cn: 超过1000的交易无法通过闪付完成。

en: Which bank is this? It seems a bit deceptive.
cn: 这是哪个银行啊？感觉有点不靠谱。

en: I also received a text message, and it's confirmed that it was sent by ICBC.
cn: 我也收到了短信，确认是工行发的。

en: The billing is indeed not as clear as that of CMB. It shows an optimal repayment of 0, which proves that the payment for the current period has already been made. After making a few more payments, it will become clearer.
cn: 账单确实没有招商银行的明朗，显示最优还款为0，证明当期已经还款了。多还几次就会清楚了。

en: My credit report has been consistently good with no overdue records. I've been using my credit card without any issues.
cn: 我的征信一直很好，没有逾期记录。我使用信用卡也没有任何问题。

en: Is the money that was borrowed used for investing in funds, stocks, futures, or paying off credit cards and loans? It counts regardless of how many times it was transferred in between.
cn: 借出去的钱有没有用来投资基金、股票、期货或者还信用卡和贷款？中间转账多少次都算。

en: I borrowed the full credit limit of 50,000 from Rong E Loan a few days ago, then I transferred it between my other bank cards for a couple of days before repaying.
cn: 我几天前从融E借款贷出了5万额度，然后把钱转了几圈到我的其他银行卡，停了两天才还款。

en: The more you browse the forums, the more experience you'll gain. You can either shop at the mall or withdraw cash. A little fee might apply.
cn: 多逛逛论坛，你的经验就会丰富起来。要么去商场购物，要么取现，可能会收点手续费。

en: I also have a card with Industrial and Commercial Bank of China.
cn: 我也有一张工商银行的卡。

en: I just canceled my online banking and mobile banking, then I encountered the following issue.
cn: 我刚刚注销了网上银行和手机银行，然后遇到了下面这个问题。

en: When can I expect to receive this? There hasn't been any progress at all...
cn: 我大概什么时候能收到这个？一点进展都没有……

en: Wow, the platinum card has these benefits? My gold card only comes with a "Happy Birthday" message. I should have signed up for a platinum one.
cn: 哇，白金卡居然有这种福利？我的金卡只有一句“生日快乐”。早知道我就办个白金卡了。

en: You can apply quickly. The credit report is checked only once a day.
cn: 你可以快点申请，一天只查一次征信。

en: What qualifications do you have? Can you share a bit? I’m interested in applying for this credit card as well.
cn: 你有什么资格吗？可以分享一下吗？我也想申请这张信用卡。

en: I don't know the code either, so I just let the financial manager download their e-service app to apply.
cn: 我也不知道代码，所以就让理财经理下载他们的e服务客户端来申请。

en: Generally, institutions within the government system or Fortune 500 companies, with mid-level management and above, would have a salary of around 500,000 a year. Would the credit limit be low?
cn: 一般来说，体制内企业或者世界500强的中层管理人员以上，年薪在50万左右。这样额度会低吗？

en: Having a provident fund would be better.
cn: 有公积金的话会更好。

en: My personal profile contact address? I just took a look at my information and it seems to be messed up. I'm starting to suspect that the reason I got rejected instantly for e-installment a few days ago was because my address got mixed up when I applied for a savings card.
cn: 我的个人资料联系方式？我刚查看了一下自己的信息，发现好像乱了。我开始怀疑前几天我申请e分期时被秒拒，是因为我办储蓄卡的时候地址搞混了。

en: The approval is likely to take about half a month. I don't have an ICBC savings card, and it's been over ten days since I applied with no update.
cn: 审批大概率需要半个月。我没有工行的储蓄卡，申请了十几天了，还是没有动静。

en: The first credit card I obtained from ICBC was an installment card, which had a limit of only 10,000. After that, I applied for a Junhun card, which increased my limit by another 10,000, effectively bringing it to 20,000 through indirect means. You can't use E-installment if the limit on your installment credit card is less than 10,000. My wife's first card from ICBC had a limit of 30...
cn: 我在工行办理的第一张信用卡是一张分期卡，额度只有1万。后来我又申请了一张军魂卡，又提高了1万的额度，这样算是曲线把额度提升到2万了。分期信用卡的额度如果不到1万是不能办理E分期的。我媳妇的工行首卡额度是30……

en: No credit inquiry is made; it simply utilizes the credit card limit.
cn: 不查征信，只是占用信用卡的额度。

en: ICBC's limit is too low, dragging down the average limit. I applied in August and activated it in September. To increase the limit, I have to wait at least a few more months. I applied for the Infinite Platinum card in October, but the limit is shared. A few days ago, I just canceled the Platinum card...
cn: 工行的额度太低了，拉低了我的平均额度。我八月份申请，九月份激活。要提高额度至少还得等几个月。我十月份申请了无界白金卡，但额度是共享的。前几天我就把白金卡注销了…

en: I have never had any interaction with the Bank of China, do not possess any cards from them, and I currently hold credit cards from four other banks: China Merchants Bank, China Everbright Bank, China Construction Bank, and Industrial Bank, with a maximum limit of 50,000. Now I want to apply for a platinum EMV card...
cn: 我与中国银行没有任何交集，没有他们的卡，当前有招行、交行、建行和兴业这四家银行的信用卡，额度最高为五万。现在我想申请一张白金EMV卡……

en: Wow, the four major banks are the toughest to deal with, but has the Bank of China, the toughest in the homeland, also become like this?
cn: 哇，四大银行真是最难打交道的，难道连天朝最难缠的中行也变成这样了吗？

en: I currently have over 900,000 points. I'm also considering whether I should start redeeming some of them. :o
cn: 我现在还有90多万积分，正在考虑要不要开始用一些了。:o

en: Is Alipay more popular than WeChat?
cn: 支付宝比微信更受欢迎吗？

en: Don't use your own phone number for this; are you trying to scam?
cn: 你别用自己的手机号，这是什么意图，想诈骗吗？

en: This is a polite refusal; if it were approved, the approved limit would be informed via text message.
cn: 这算是婉拒了，如果真审批通过的话，会通过短信告知额度的。

en: I applied for several mobile cards back in college, but I never properly closed the accounts. Eventually, they all fell into arrears and got suspended, and later on, they blacklisted me.
cn: 我上大学的时候办过几张手机卡，但都没有正常销户。后来都欠费停机，最后也就被拉黑了。

en: Overdue on a reduced limit, can't perform?
cn: 降额逾期，不能行动？

en: Bank of China typically executes after a few months of overdue payment.
cn: 中国银行一般在逾期几个月后会采取执行措施。

en: When I called to file a complaint on Friday, I requested the remaining personalized installment payments.
cn: 我周五打电话投诉的时候，要求剩余的个性化分期付款。

en: All the other shady banks have been closed.
cn: 其他不靠谱的银行都已经关门了。

en: I feel the same way; I applied in the early hours last night. If I get rejected, I should receive a text before 9:30.
cn: 我也是，昨晚凌晨申请的，如果拒绝的话，应该会在9:30之前收到短信。

en: I couldn't find the application status yesterday morning, so I called customer service and they confirmed it was approved. I was worried about it yesterday.
cn: 我昨天早上找不到申请的状态，就打电话给客服，他们确认申请通过了。昨天我还挺担心的。

en: Are points from Bank of China valuable? 36 yuan for 30,000 points seems like a good deal, but it appears that you can't exchange points for mobile recharge anymore.
cn: 中国银行的积分值钱吗？用36块钱换30000积分似乎不错，但好像现在不能用积分换话费了。

en: ICBC 1k ~ 50k ~ 65k
cn: 工行 1千到5万再到6.5万

en: The oil trading platform may have suffered a significant blow, leading to a reduction in marketing expenses.
cn: 原油交易平台可能遭受了重大打击，导致缩减了营销费用。

en: You can just link your WeChat with the card number.
cn: 用卡号直接绑定微信就可以了。

en: Check the activation card number and activate it on WeChat; bind the card number directly on WeChat.
cn: 查看激活卡号并在微信上激活；直接在微信上绑定卡号。

en: Is there really anyone who deposits money into a credit card? How does that compare with various investment options offered by a savings account?
cn: 真的有人会往信用卡存钱吗？这样跟储蓄卡的各种理财产品比起来，怎么样呢？

en: Is it a loan after checking the credit?
cn: 查完信用后还是贷款？

en: I saw this after 12 o'clock. The fixed recommendation has changed from 13 to 11, and the temporary recommendation has changed from 16 to 14. The limits are all quite high.
cn: 我12点之后看到的，固定推荐从13变成了11，临时推荐从16变成了14，额度都挺高的。

en: Have my bills decreased recently? I reduced my spending in April and May as recommended, but my expenses were higher in June, and the recommendation still hasn’t increased this month. I can’t figure out if it’s related to how much I spend.
cn: 最近我的账单少了？我四月和五月的消费按照推荐减少了，但六月份的消费却增加了，这个月的推荐依然没有提高。我搞不清楚这是否和消费金额有关。

en: Is this method feasible? I also plan to go to the bank to apply for an account.
cn: 这个方法可行吗？我还打算去银行申请一个账户。

en: I personally believe that this is just my opinion and it doesn't represent others. It's like having a general among the disabled; ultimately, it's all inferior material, and there are still those at the bottom of the hierarchy.
cn: 我个人认为这只是我的看法，并不代表其他人。这就像在残疾人中有将军一样；最终，都是一些劣质的东西，还有一些鸡头的存在。

en: Are you a high-ranking institution? With just an ID card and a business card, you’re already giving such a high limit... I’m impressed, really impressed...
cn: 你们真的是高端单位啊？仅凭身份证和名片就能给出这么高的额度……我真是佩服佩服……

en: Dear Customer, welcome to become a five-star user of ICBC.
cn: 尊敬的客户，欢迎您成为工行的五星用户。

en: The limit is set at 19K, but if I don't fill in 23K, is this amount from ICBC acceptable?
cn: 额度修到19K，不填23K，那工行这个额度可以吗？

en: I went to Industrial and Commercial Bank too, applied for 570,000 with 10 banks, but couldn't get approved no matter what!
cn: 我也是去工行，申请了57万，找了10家银行，怎么申请都没通过！

en: I guess there are too many numbers for Line 8, and the total amount is also a bit high.
cn: 我觉得8号线的数量有点多，总金额也偏高。

en: I'm really scared that my second card will be rejected, even though I haven't applied for it yet.
cn: 我很担心我的第二张卡会被拒，尽管我还没申请。

en: It's not easy for the Bank of China; what qualifications does the OP have?
cn: 中行真不容易，楼主有什么资质呢？

en: I made another deposit on the 18th and then made a purchase.
cn: 我在18号又存了一笔钱，之后又消费了一下。

en: It seems that mobile banking is going to primarily promote the mobile shield and the SIM shield.
cn: 看起来手机银行要主要推广手机盾和SIM护盾。

en: Why is the cash flow so large?
cn: 为什么现金流这么大？

en: If the bank sends you a text around 12:25 PM, it means you have a chance! If you receive a text around 9 AM or 5 PM, it generally means you don't stand a chance!
cn: 如果银行在中午12点25分左右发短信给你，说明你还有希望！如果是在上午9点或下午5点收到短信，那基本上没戏了！

en: Another one from the Industrial and Commercial Bank...
cn: 又是来自工行的评论...

en: There's no need to sell before the dividend payout.
cn: 没必要在分红前就卖掉。

en: The dividend will be deducted from the stock price, so you won't see a 6% gain until the price rebounds to 3.3.
cn: 分红会从股价中扣除，所以你要等到股价回升到3.3才会看到6%的收益。

en: Is unified lending not a provisional loan? I’m not really sure; a provisional loan is different, as deposits earn interest, but it seems like...
cn: 统一借贷不是一种临时贷款吗？我不是很确定；临时贷款是不同的，因为存款可以获得利息，但感觉好像…

en: Are you still there? I have an ICBC card from 2011. I reported a bad credit entry in 2014. Today, I paid it off, and they helped me fill out a personal credit dispute application. Once it gets updated, will I be able to clear my credit history immediately? ...
cn: 你还在吗？我有张2011年的工行卡，14年报过一次坏账。今天我把它还清了，他们还帮我填了个人征信异议申请。这一更新后，我是不是就能立马清白了？...

en: It's probably not about holding a grudge. You can apply again after some time; taking a step back will help.
cn: 这应该不是记仇，过段时间再申请，放宽心会更好。

en: Most of the merchants listed are clothing stores, and there is also a transaction at a wellness center. This seems like a case of overspending, right? The credit limit should increase pretty soon.
cn: 列出的商户大部分是服装店，还有一笔是在保健馆。这看起来确实是多花了吧？额度应该很快就能提升了。

en: I used Lakaala today, and it showed a transaction failure with code 62 for an amount of 48,000. What's going on?
cn: 我今天用拉卡拉刷卡，显示62的交易失败，金额是四万八。这是怎么回事啊！

en: You only show up on the credit report once you borrow money.
cn: 你借款后才会上征信。

en: The credit report should only show loan approvals, not the loans themselves. If it does show the loans, it will be difficult for me to increase the limits on my other credit cards.
cn: 征信报告应该只显示贷款审批，而不应显示具体的贷款。如果显示了具体的贷款，我其他的信用卡额度就很难提高了。

en: What's the point of having a second card? It's simply just about scanning for six thousand every month. It's easy.
cn: 要第二张卡有什么意义？无非就是每个月扫码六千而已，挺简单的。

en: The Bank of China app has this card listed under card activation. If you go to activate it, you can view the complete card number, take a screenshot to save it, and then activate it through the WeChat official account.
cn: 中国银行的APP里可以找到这张卡，在激活的时候可以看到完整的卡号，记得截图保存，然后通过微信公众号去激活。

en: I firmly resist. The Bank of China is now urging me to repay, but I've only been given a credit limit of 10,000.
cn: 我坚决抵制。现在中国银行催我还款，可我只有一万的额度。

en: The application for the second card online does not check credit history and is approved instantly.
cn: 二卡网申不查征信，秒批。

en: It's not bad since it's delivery work; the credit limit increases quite quickly.
cn: 还不错，毕竟是做外卖的，额度上升得很快。

en: The daily enjoyment plan offers higher returns than the seven-day plan.
cn: 乐享天天的收益比乐享七天的要高。

en: Credit card approval is definitely a pre-approval process, while credit limit increases are part of post-approval management.
cn: 信用卡审批肯定是前期流程，而提额则属于后续管理。

en: Is Bank of China really that appealing?
cn: 中国银行真的那么吸引人吗？

en: I have been getting rejected for the past two months after activation, so...
cn: 激活后这两个月我总是被拒绝，所以…

en: ABC Essence / China Eastern Airlines White_100k
cn: 农业银行精粹/东航白_10万元

en: What are the requirements for the Fudan University in-service certificate?
cn: 复旦大学在职证书需要什么条件？

en: The Agricultural Bank's first online application for the No-Boundary Card was approved instantly.
cn: 农行的首张网上申请的无界卡秒批通过了。

en: Don't listen to those who speak nonsense; can you really just ignore this? If you ignore it, all your credit cards will be affected, and you will face complete financial ruin.
cn: 别听那些胡说八道的人，这件事真的能不管吗？如果不管，你所有的信用卡都会受到影响，到时候可就惨了。

en: I can't pay the money back, so whatever happens, happens.
cn: 我还不上钱，随便吧，爱怎么着怎么着。

en: I didn't invest; the funds are already losing money. Even if I had, it wouldn't have made a difference.
cn: 我没有投资，基金已经亏损了。就算我投资了也没什么区别。

en: Do you have a mortgage with Agricultural Bank? I noticed you mentioned earlier that you are unemployed. If you have a mortgage, it's better not to have any overdue payments on the bank loan, especially since this is a case of principal overdue.
cn: 你是农行按揭房吗？我注意到你之前说你没有工作。如果你有按揭房，最好不要在银行贷款上逾期，特别是你这是本金逾期的情况。

en: When you call to explain your situation, they usually offer some grace period. It's quite considerate of them.
cn: 打电话说明情况时，他们一般都会给出一定的宽限期，这真的很有人情味。

en: The Agricultural Bank doesn't offer credit cards.
cn: 农行是没有信用卡的。

en: The limit will likely be higher if you own a 2020 model car.
cn: 如果你名下有一辆2020年的车，额度可能会比较高。

en: I wasn't working when I applied for the Agricultural Bank, but it was easy to get the Dream White loan.
cn: 我在申请农行的时候也没上班，但申请燃梦白贷款很顺利。

en: I started with 3.67 and now it's 4.26. There is a 30-day grace period, China Merchants Bank, for reference.
cn: 我开始时是3.67，现在是4.26。宽限期是30天，招商银行，供参考。

en: Some people don’t get a second card for the show, while others pass it along the next day. Do you have the script? You won't know until you try.
cn: 有的人没有得到第二张剧卡，而有的人则隔天就传了一遍。你有剧本吗？试了才知道。

en: What did you do about it later? I encountered a similar situation and I'm a bit worried now.
cn: 后来你是怎么处理的？我也碰到过类似的情况，现在有点担心。

en: Is there a delay in credit reporting?
cn: 征信会有延迟吗？

en: It's also a mortgage from Agricultural Bank.
cn: 也是农行的房 mortgage。

en: What areas are available? I can't even get things done in Beijing, it's so stressful.
cn: 什么地方可以办理呢？我在北京都办不了，真的是太焦虑了。

en: Rest assured, ICBC will deduct the amount the next morning; if it’s on the weekend, the deduction will be postponed.
cn: 放心，工行会在第二天早上扣款，如果是周末的话，就会延期处理。

en: It's foolish to keep the Agricultural Bank's account statements.
cn: 傻傻地养着农行的账单。

en: Are you a customer of the Old Farmer's Home Loan?
cn: 你是老农房贷的客户吗？

en: The correct answer is that with the fixed amount, I still can't withdraw most of it. The rules are no longer the same as two years ago; they keep changing.
cn: 正确的说法是，固定金额还是提不了大部分，已经不是两年前的规则了，规则一直在变。

en: Old farmer: They won't let go of such minor issues; Agricultural Bank is really stingy.
cn: 老农：这点小问题都不放过，农行真的是太小气了。

en: Bro, could you check with customer service to see exactly where the process is? I'm getting really anxious waiting.
cn: 哥们，你能问问客服具体进展到哪一步了吗？我等得有点焦虑。

en: I previously had a "You Ran Bai" card with a limit of only 5,000, so I canceled it. Now that I re-applied, my status is currently pending.
cn: 我之前有一张“悠然白”的卡，额度只有5000，所以我把它销了。现在我重新申请，状态还是待处理。

en: I asked customer service about my application, which has been stuck at the branch for 14 days without being reported. I didn't go to the branch myself, and it’s still pending. Once it was reported, it was approved in just a few hours, and it was only for 5k... The branch still treats this like it's a big deal...
cn: 我问了客服，关于我的申请，在支行压了14天都没上报。我没有亲自去网点看，结果还在那卡着。一上报，几个小时就批下来了，才5千…网点却还是这么悠闲地当成大事来处理…

en: The 56-day interest-free period mentioned on the official website, for example for airline credit cards, should also apply as a long interest-free period, right?
cn: 官网上提到的56天免息期，比如航空信用卡，应该也是适用于长免息期吧？

en: I have never used a credit card.
cn: 我从来没用过信用卡。

en: The interest-free period varies by card type. For the Shenyouran White card, it's definitely 56 days.
cn: 免息期根据卡种不同。对于申悠然白卡，绝对是56天。

en: Leisure White for 56 Days
cn: 悠闲白，一个有56天的期限

en: The four major banks and Postal Savings Bank are all frustratingly unreliable.
cn: 四大银行和邮政储蓄银行都是让人无奈的选择。

en: The qualifications are not good, so the limit is low.
cn: 资质不行，所以额度就不高。

en: Where can I check? I've been waiting for a long time too.
cn: 我在哪里可以查看？我也等了很久了。

en: Hengfeng Bank rejected me instantly.
cn: 恒丰银行一下子就拒绝了我。

en: People without any documentation—does that mean they are part of the system? Otherwise, how could you apply? That's really pitiful.
cn: 没有任何证件的人—这是不是意味着他们是体制内的人？否则你怎么能申请？真让人心疼。

en: Where did you apply for this? It's so impressive!
cn: 你在哪里申请的，这么给力啊！

en: I tried the teeth cleaning service today. It was really good.
cn: 今天我体验了洗牙服务，真的很好。

en: Did you ask the card representative? I'm anxiously waiting.
cn: 你有没有问问卡片的工作人员？我在焦急地等着。

en: I inquired but received no response, so forget it. I'm switching to ICBC.
cn: 我问了，但没有回复我，所以算了。我换回工商银行。

en: I asked, and he said the Elite White card is quite slow; I'm really frustrated.
cn: 我问了，他说精英白卡的速度很慢，我真是无奈。

en: Waiting for a call; the results will probably come the day after tomorrow. If it's not entered, I don't know how long it will take. This bank is unreliable.
cn: 在等电话，结果可能后天才会出来。如果还没录入，我也不知道要等多久。这个银行真不靠谱。

en: Did you find it? I have now found it and displayed the entry.
cn: 你找到了吗？我现在已经找到了，并且显示了条目。

en: The bank opens accounts directly without much questioning; that's how SPD Bank operates.
cn: 银行基本不问就直接开卡，浦发就是这样的。

en: Some people are taking loans from Minsheng Bank in amounts of 90,000 to 100,000 and waiting for two months to reduce their liabilities before applying again.
cn: 有人在民生银行申请了9万到10万的贷款，然后会等两个月降低负债，再申请。

en: I asked the card representative, and they said Minsheng Bank doesn’t have restrictions on the number of credit cards; even with more than ten cards, you can still get approved.
cn: 我问过办卡的工作人员了，他们说民生银行对信用卡的数量没有限制，十张以上也能申请到卡。

en: Don't activate accounts outside of prefecture-level cities?? In some places, even counties without branches require going to the city for activation.
cn: 在地级市外根本不激活账户？？有些地方县里没有网点，必须去市里才能激活。

en: Minsheng didn't pass, so what about Industrial Bank?
cn: 民生银行没有通过，那兴业银行怎么样？

en: Basically missed out, and it won't be approved in the future either. Just give it up.
cn: 基本错过了，以后也不会批准，放弃吧。

en: QB doesn’t have a split payment option, but Q has it. I’ve personally tested it with my own funds, and it works well.
cn: QB没有分期付款功能，但是Q有。我亲自用自备的资金测试过，效果很好。

en: I want what I can't have, yet both of you have it.
cn: 我想要的我却得不到，你们俩居然都有。

en: How did you activate it, OP? I've also been approved for the limit but I'm unsure how to activate it for use.
cn: 楼主，你是怎么激活的？我也有额度，但不知道怎么激活来刷。

en: Focus on yourself, there's no need to compare your limits with others.
cn: 关注自己，不需要和别人比较额度。

en: Wow? You are amazing! Where did you find that information? What about the face-to-face interview? If the home visit wasn't completed...
cn: 哇，你真厉害！你在哪里找到这些信息的？面签呢？如果上门拜访没有完成的话……

en: The process is straightforward; just follow the credit inquiry. The prefix is no longer needed; fill out a form to activate at the counter.
cn: 过程很简单，按征信来就行，前缀不用了，去柜台填一张表单激活就可以。

en: Who would dare to give you a guarantee...? Are you out of your mind?
cn: 谁敢给你保证呢…你是疯了吗？

en: It's fine to give it a try when refueling. It's a co-branded card. Don't worry, you won't be charged for nothing; rest assured.
cn: 加油的时候试试也没什么关系。这是一张联名卡。别担心，不会无缘无故扣钱的，放心吧。

en: Just bought a U宝 today.
cn: 今天刚买了个U宝。

en: You used the full amount of your credit card, and your principal installment decreases every month, leaving you with little money afterward.
cn: 你刷了信用卡的全额，分期本金每个月减少，之后基本上没什么钱用了。

en: Guangfa Water White and Water Black 3P
cn: 广发水白和水黑3P

en: The salesperson came to my door to handle the transaction, which was very convenient.
cn: 业务员上门来处理事务，真是非常方便。

en: You still need to make an appointment with Minsheng Bank.
cn: 民生银行还是需要预约的。

en: Have you closed your account before? It won't work if you have canceled it.
cn: 你以前销过卡吗？如果注销过的话就不行了。

en: Where did you apply, and did you activate it in Zibo?
cn: 你是在哪申请的，去淄博激活的吗？

en: Where can I file a complaint? Which city are you in?
cn: 我可以在哪里投诉？你在哪个城市？

en: I also applied on Friday. Did you receive it? I'm really worried.
cn: 我也是周五申请的。你收到了吗？我很担心。

en: The amount has increased, thank you for letting me know.
cn: 金额增加了，谢谢你告诉我。

en: Is it really going to take so long? I want to resolve this as soon as possible.
cn: 真的要拖那么久吗？我希望尽早解决这个问题。

en: How about we apply together at the beginning of next month? I need to apply for Minsheng and Guanye on April 5th.
cn: 要不我们下个月初一起申请？我在4月5日要同时申请民生和关业。

en: Should I apply directly online or use the Easy Installment plan?
cn: 我应该直接网上申请还是使用全民分期易呢？

en: How do I apply for the Universal Installment Plan?
cn: 我该如何申请全民分期易？

en: The sales staff is limited. Would it be better to apply through the app? Estimating in stages may still be useful. Let's give it a try. Is this the second batch? Don't hesitate, take action yourself. Should we apply together at the beginning of next month? On April 5th, I want to apply for both Minsheng and customs clearance at the same time. I’d like to try the staged process...

cn: 这种贷款不会让你陷入困境，也不会花费你一分钱。

cn: 难怪从民生银行借了款后，八个月来都没有哪个银行提起过。

cn: 真的吗？现在有借钱和分期付款的选项了。

cn: 我去年六月初开通的账户，到现在连临时额度都没见过，更别提固定额度了。

en: I haven't activated it yet since I'm in a different location, and this situation came up.
cn: 我还没去激活，因为我在异地，正好遇到这个情况。

cn: 我前几天网申请了49000的秒批贷款，马上收到了初审额度通过的短信，现在下卡的额度就是初审的额度。

en: After making the selection, it will only synchronize the next day, and I don't have any exclusive limit.
cn: 点完之后，只有第二天才能同步，而且我没有任何专享额度。

cn: 我也是被忽视了，几年都没回应，已经放弃挣扎。

en: Paying off the installment plan really makes me think I might need to switch to a different card type.
cn: 还完分期付款后，我真的在考虑要换一种卡了。

cn: 我该怎么做才能提额呢？哈哈，我几年都没变过，至少有三年了。我卡也没怎么用。

cn: 这张卡快两年了，我一分钱都没有取出来，三万块真的像个陷阱。

en: The 30,000 credit limit was instantly approved but unexpectedly put into a suspense state; the 30,000 limit from Minsheng is quite mysterious.

cn: 我当天存了钱，立刻取出了90%。第二天我继续取光了剩下的，只留下了大约2000元的真实消费！

en: Minsheng Bank requires quick responses, it's exhausting.
cn: 民生银行需要快速反应，真是累。

en: The bank is favorable towards increasing your credit limit the more you use their services.
cn: 银行很喜欢你多消费，这样就能提高你的信用额度。

cn: 我停用了两年，准备重新开始使用。你有什么好的建议吗？额度会和之前一样吗？

cn: 我已经15个月没提取了。

cn: 曲线不太理想……在五万元以下线下申请还有可能。

cn: 我不在乎，反正我的建行就是这样的。

cn: 我跟民生的事情结束了，今天把所有的钱都一次性用来全款买房了。还欠了近10万的信用卡债。不过我近期想试试其他的方式，不用再办理房贷，征信方面也不用那么紧张了。

cn: 我有五万块存了一年，昨天才提了五千，这10%的幅度，提额的速度真是慢。

cn: 我没有遇到过问题，我的交易都是跟工商银行、农业银行、中国招商银行和交通银行进行的，款项都顺利到账。

cn: 你的卡情况稍微好一点，但对我来说，管理十一行变得更困难了。之前从十五行减到八行，现在又有反弹的趋势……

cn: 坚持多样化的消费方式会带来机会。TX正在将网购、日常缴费（例如话费、水费、电费和燃气费）以及日常扫码支付结合起来，让……

en: The more you use it, the more chances you’ll have to get a credit limit increase in no time.
cn: 多用你的信用卡，提额的机会很快就来了。

cn: 一般会记录三到六个月的账单，每隔几天尝试一下，有时候会忘记，系统就会自动提取。

cn: 楼主直接向银监会投诉，别跟民生银行争论了。

cn: 我担心这会不会影响我的信用卡。如果不会影响的话，我也做好准备了。

cn: 排在最前面的就是民生银行热推的卡。

cn: 我在定期存款上投资了10万，已经三年了，却一直没提取过。这是怎么回事？

cn: 我也不知道为什么，我在09年办的交行卡额度不到一万，从来没有分过，现在额度变成15万了。

cn: 对招行的投诉根本没用，我已经起诉了，态度非常坚决。

cn: 利率还不错……分期付款计划挺人性化的。

cn: 暂存金额超出了限制。可以直接操作而不需要电话邀请吗？

cn: 根本不用担心，他们经常打电话给你提议分期付款，因为他们从手续费中赚钱。
